data.name: Folktale
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Forktale. Forktale is a 3rd person action-combat game.
In game, you will play an action hero who has a duty to save fantasy land 'Proditio'. You must defeat all the enemy in order to save Proditio from Villian 'Dugal'. Enter a fantasy world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Defeat enemies to gather experience and equipment in order to defeat stronger enemies.


Features include :

- Action
- Adventure
- Role-Playing
- Storyline
- Adorable Characters!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Enter Forktale today and play your way to reveal secrets of Proditio land.

data.short_description: Forktale is a 3rd person fantasy game full of adventure and action.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel® Quad Core
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
